name: @yomikiri/rust
description: JS build script used for yomikiri-rs
author: BlueGreenMagick

scripts._build_uniffi_bindgen: cargo run --features "uniffi/cli uniffi-bindgen" --bin uniffi-bindgen generate --language swift --lib-file ../target/release/libyomikiri_rs.a --out-dir ./swift ./src/uniffi_yomikiri.udl
scripts.ios: pnpm run _clean_swift && pnpm run _build_release_lib && pnpm run _build_uniffi_bindgen && pnpm run _build_ios && pnpm run _build_ios_sim
scripts.wasm: pnpm run _clean_pkg && wasm-pack build --scope yomikiri --target web && pnpm run chunk_wasm
